Text:
Hi rambam1776,

I sincerely hope that you read this. Thank you so much for all your fantastic uploads so far, please continue the great job of sharing your treasure of knowledge, many thanks....

Will do my part by seeding for as long as possible...

Contributor1979  - 

Thank you, that's very kind and gratifying to hear.

Of course, according to SOME commentators, I am either a fascist neo-con (Hello, drymouse), or a lying left-wing pinko (Indoeuro).

Nice to know a few folks appreciate it for what it is.
I second what contributor1979 said! Thanks!
